function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Difficulty in comprehending the resilience metric","Impact":"Inaccurate decision making and misallocation of resources","Mitigation":"Provide training and education on the resilience metric and its implications","Technologies":"Educational materials and workshops","People":"Decision makers, stakeholders","Owner":"Government agencies, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Assumed instantaneous impact of disruptive events","Impact":"Underestimation of the time needed for recovery and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Conduct scenario-based planning to account for gradual impact and recovery","Technologies":"Simulation tools and scenario modeling software","People":"Emergency response teams, disaster planners","Owner":"Municipalities, disaster management agencies"},{"Description":"Linear recovery assumption may not be realistic for some systems and events","Impact":"Ineffective planning and resource allocation for recovery","Mitigation":"Conduct system-specific analysis and consider non-linear recovery models","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, non-linear modeling software","People":"Resilience planners, system analysts","Owner":"Private organizations, research institutions"}]}
